title: PATCH NOTE: 7.22-7.24 My frames keep dropping

replies.body:
Riot JxE was talking about these problems in some of the latest patches, but it doesn't seem like he's updated that post reflecting whether or not they've ironed this out or not yet. 

If the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) hasn't been able to help, I'd double check that your drivers are fully updated and running properly. After that, be sure to reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more troubleshooting if needed.
